Title:

Catalina
Artist: Jackie Johnston
About: Original
Size: 16 inches x 20 inches
Media: soft pastel on board
Year: 2020
Location: In the artist's collection
Exhibited:
2022 Maui Pastel Society's Second Annual Pastel Show Juried/judged by Clark Mitchell and Neida Bangerter, Village Gallery, Lahaina, Hawaii. (Juried group exhibit.)
2020 Members Only Online Show (MOOS) Juried by Clark G. Mitchell, Pastel Society of the West Coast. (Online juried group exhibit.)
